com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
Interface Entity

All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityAdapter
public interface Entity

Denotes an entity whose state is managed using the state transition machine. Entities are opaque objects to the state machine.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Hodges
